title: Server Update
body: Any updates to what is happening now the server has finished? I play from various locations (about 70 miles from each other) and the ping is pretty different. In Anaheim, CA, I get like 80-90 ping, but in Wrightwood, CA, I get around 62. I have friends in Sacramento that have similar issues; some have around 60 and some have around 90.

replies.body: The biggest factors in your ping is going to be your internet speed and geographical location, as well as the route that your ISP is sending your connection. If you were referring to the slight server issues we were having earlier, those should be cleared up by now. Let me know if you're having any specific issues and I can help troubleshoot!
